Package com.dooapp.gaedo.blueprints.transformers

Interface Summary
LiteralTransformer<Type> Allow transformation of a data type into a literal vertex
Transformer Base interface for all kind of transformer, it allows more generic code (like the Transformers class)
TransformerAssociation<TransformerKind extends Transformer>  
TupleTransformer<Type>  
 

Class Summary
AbstractLiteralTransformer<Type> Helper class for literal transformer
AbstractSimpleLiteralTransformer<Type>  
AbstractTupleTransformer<TupleType>  
BooleanLiteralTransformer  
ClassLiteralTransformer  
DateLiteralTransformer As SimpleDateFormat is not thread-safe and construction heavy, see here (http: //www.jmdoudoux.fr/java/dej/chap-utilisation_dates.htm#utilisation_dates-3) for the why of this pattern Furthermore, used pattern is ISO standard (see there : http://www.fileformat.info/tip/java/simpledateformat.htm)
EnumLiteralTransformer  
MapEntryTransformer  
NumberLiteralTransformer  
SerializableTransformer Serializable handling is quite particular.
StringLiteralTransformer  
Transformers Utility class factorizing some code
TypeUtils  
URILiteralTransformer  
WriteableKeyEntry<K,V> An impelmentation of Map.Entry allowing us to write key, very useful to load objects !
 

Enum Summary
Literals An helper class allowing easy literal transformer lookup
Tuples Enum listing the classes considered as tuples, sharing the same mechanism than Literals
